item.title: Local LA theaters bring puppets and movies to families for respite from fires
item.description: Vidiots and the Bob Baker Marionette Theater teamed up to provide an escape from reality for families facing trauma and loss from the Los Angeles wildfires.

item.title: Netanyahu delays ceasefire vote, claiming Hamas created a 'last minute crisis'
item.description: The deal was set to be ratified by Israeli Cabinet on Thursday. But Netanyahu says, without specifying, that Hamas has gone back on several parts of the ceasefire agreement at the last minute.

item.title: How would RFK Jr. handle bird flu? His record on vaccines has experts on edge
item.description: Trump's pick for health secretary has a record of attacking vaccines. In fact he's even taken direct aim at bird flu shots. Some scientists fear this doesn't bode well in case of a crisis.

item.title: Trump wants a quick end to the Ukraine war. That's a tall order
item.description: The war has reached a critical point. A real peace seems unlikely, but a ceasefire is possible, most experts agree. The question is whether it can be achieved without placing Ukraine in further peril.

item.title: A need for speed: Several states are looking for ways to count votes faster
item.description: Lawmakers in California and other states want to change vote-counting rules to speed up the process. One key question is whether counting can be sped up without sacrificing access to the ballot.
